title: Mark VII Industrial Exoskeleton
content:
The Mark VII Industrial Exoskeleton is a powered armor system designed for extreme industrial environments. Features include: atmospheric filtration, enhanced strength augmentation, integrated tool systems, and neural interface compatibility. Standard issue for all Rustbone facility personnel.

Technical Specifications:
- Power Source: Micro-fusion cell (72-hour operation)
- Strength Multiplier: 8x baseline human capability
- Environmental Protection: Radiation, toxins, extreme temperatures
- Weight: 85kg (feels like 12kg when powered)
- Neural Response Time: 12ms

title: Umbral Processing Station
content:
A massive orbital station serving as the primary processing hub for raw materials extracted from the Rustbone facility. The station houses approximately 50,000 personnel and serves as the gateway between the planetary operations and the greater colonial network.

Key Facilities:
- Decontamination and quarantine bays
- Material processing plants
- Personnel housing for 6-month rotations
- Emergency evacuation systems
- Deep-space communication arrays

title: Cortical Neural Interface System
content:
Direct brain-computer interface allowing seamless integration with exoskeleton systems and facility machinery. Implanted at the base of the skull, the interface creates a high-bandwidth connection between human consciousness and artificial systems.

Capabilities:
- Real-time system monitoring
- Predictive maintenance alerts
- Enhanced reaction times
- Direct equipment control
- Emergency override systems

Side Effects:
- Dependency syndrome after extended use
- Phantom limb sensations when disconnected
- Potential personality drift in long-term users

title: Personal Atmospheric Processing Unit
content:
Integrated air filtration and conditioning system within the exoskeleton. Capable of extracting breathable atmosphere from hostile environments through advanced molecular filtering and chemical processing.

Filters:
- Particulate matter (99.97% efficiency)
- Toxic gases and chemical vapors
- Biological contaminants
- Radioactive particles
- Corrosive compounds

Emergency oxygen supply: 8 hours independent operation

title: Rustbone Deep Mining Complex
content:
The largest deep-core mining operation in the colonial frontier. Extending over 15 kilometers into the planetary crust, the facility extracts rare earth elements and exotic materials essential for advanced technology production.

Levels:
- Surface Operations (Levels 0-10)
- Primary Mining (Levels 11-50)
- Deep Core Extraction (Levels 51-150)
- Experimental Research (Levels 151+)

The facility employs over 200,000 workers across three shifts. Mortality rate: 23% annually.

Named for the distinctive rust-colored mineral formations that contain the most valuable deposits.

title: Industrial Fusion Processing Array
content:
Massive fusion-powered industrial complexes used for processing raw materials into refined components. Each forge operates at temperatures exceeding 10 million degrees Celsius, contained within magnetic field generators.

Operations:
- Molecular restructuring of base materials
- Exotic alloy synthesis
- Crystalline matrix formation
- Radioactive waste processing
- Energy generation for facility operations

Safety Protocols:
- Minimum safe distance: 500 meters
- Radiation exposure limits: 15 minutes maximum
- Emergency containment systems
- Automated shutdown procedures

title: Environmental Thermal Control System
content:
Advanced climate control system integrated into the exoskeleton's life support matrix. Maintains optimal body temperature in extreme environmental conditions through a combination of active cooling and heating systems.

Systems:
- Liquid cooling circuit with heat exchangers
- Emergency heating elements
- Insulation layer management
- Automated temperature monitoring
- Predictive thermal load balancing

Operating Range: -80°C to +200°C ambient temperature

title: La Esfera-Prisión Rustbone
content: Rustbone es una esfera hueca de 80 kilómetros de diámetro que flota en el espacio profundo. En su interior, la humanidad vive confinada en 20 anillos industriales organizados en 5 zonas verticales. La estructura fue construida por los Custodios hace más de 1000 años como prisión para la humanidad, acusada de ser una civilización 'Devoradora de Mundos'.

title: El Horno - Generador de Gravedad
content: El Horno es el núcleo de Rustbone, una cámara de contención que alberga un fragmento de una Entidad Cósmica aprisionada. Esta entidad genera la gravedad artificial que mantiene a los 38 millones de habitantes pegados a la superficie interior de la esfera. El Horno emite radiación constante y calor extremo.

title: La Frecuencia - Poder Biofísico
content: La Frecuencia es la capacidad de manipular materia mediante vibración celular resonante. No es magia, sino un fenómeno biofísico descubierto accidentalmente. Los usuarios pueden mover objetos, alterar su densidad o incluso manipular el metal oxidado. Sin embargo, su uso causa calcificación progresiva del cuerpo.
